00010 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00011 
00012 CHelpMenu::CHelpMenu(CInfoScene *&p_InfoScene, Uint8 dlg_theme,
00013   CExeFile &ExeFile,
00014   bool &hideobjects) :
00015 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00016 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00017 mp_InfoScene(p_InfoScene),
00018 m_Episode(ExeFile.getEpisode()),
00019 m_GamePath(ExeFile.getDataDirectory()),
00020 m_hideobjects(hideobjects)
00021 {
00022  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(18, 9, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN,m_dlg_theme);
00023 
00024  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, "The Menu");
00025  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, "The Game");
00026  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, "The Story");
00027  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, "Ordering Info");
00028  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, "About ID");
00029  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 6, "About CG");
00030  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 7, "Credits");
00031 }
00032 
00033 void CHelpMenu::processSpecific()
00034 {
00035  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00036  {
00037   //m_Map.m_animation_enabled = false;
00038   // no cleanups here, because later we return back to that menu
00039   switch(m_selection)
00040   {
00041   case 0:
00042    mp_InfoScene = new CHelp(m_ExeFile, "Menu");
00043    break;
00044   case 1:
00045    mp_InfoScene = new CHelp(m_ExeFile, "Game");
00046    break;
00047   case 2:
00048    mp_InfoScene = new CStory(m_ExeFile);
00049    break;
00050   case 3:
00051    mp_InfoScene = new COrderingInfo(m_ExeFile);
00052    break;
00053   case 4:
00054    mp_InfoScene = new CAbout(m_ExeFile, "ID");
00055    break;
00056   case 5:
00057    mp_InfoScene = new CAbout(m_ExeFile, "CG");
00058    break;
00059   case 6:
00060    mp_InfoScene = new CCredits(m_ExeFile.getDataDirectory(),
00061           m_ExeFile.getEpisode());
00062    break;
00063   }
00064   m_hideobjects = true;
00065   m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00066   m_mustclose = true;
00067  }
00068 }
00069 
00070 CHelpMenu::~CHelpMenu()
00071 {
00072  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Dialog);
00073 }
